myosotis.item.falls: If I could be like a chicken...
myosotis.item.spider_string: A string, too bad it can't entangle the spider...
myosotis.advancements.death.root.title: Brave untold danger
myosotis.advancements.death.root.descrip: Why respawn? Because the world itself is an immortal will—and you're its main character
myosotis.advancements.adventure.kill_by_: Getting mobbed by zombies—just parry this you casual
myosotis.advancements.adventure.explosio: Gunpowder, TNT, and everything nice—that's the recipe for bOOM
myosotis.advancements.adventure.kill_by_: Wolf or dog? Still a good boy
Bones may tame wolves but they can still bite
Spider? Itsy Bitsy went hard on leg day
Arachnophobia mode activated—too bad it's still huge
myosotis.advancements.adventure.death_by: The sky is the limit... right?
